lines.text: Does it matter where it's from? Maybe that Go Wizard just really liked that statue and bought it up.
I don't think so. You've seen this place, right?
I mean, it's a dump, right? Does he look like the kind of guy who has enough money to go impulse-buyin' statues?
I mean... guy could just be a rich slob.
He wouldn't be livin' in this part of town if he had money, kid.
This thing's got a reason for bein' here, and I've got a hunch it's connected to this case.
Fine, fine. I'll figure it out.
